subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON (AP) — Jim Bowden sauntered out of the home clubhouse at Nationals Park and headed toward Washington Manager Manny Acta, raising his voice loud enough for bystanders to hear.
snippet: WASHINGTON (AP) — Jim Bowden sauntered out of the home clubhouse at Nationals Park and headed toward Washington Manager Manny Acta, raising his voice loud enough for bystanders to hear.
